articles.description: Two weeks ago, Liverpool were top of the Premier League and had a favourable route to the Europa League final - things now look very different for Jurgen Klopp's side as his departure looms.
articles.title: Liverpool 'playing under stress' but should not 'mope around'

articles.description: Aston Martin's Lance Stroll tops the times at the end of a practice session at the Chinese Grand Prix that offered few clues as to the weekend ahead.
articles.title: Chinese Grand Prix 2024: Lance Stroll fastest

articles.description: West Ham boss David Moyes is involved in a frosty exchange with a reporter after being asked about his future after their Europa League exit.
articles.title: 'Sorry, I didn't get that question' - Moyes frosty with reporter

articles.description: Roma progress to the Europa League semi-finals by beating Serie A rivals AC Milan at Stadio Olimpico.
articles.title: Roma see off AC Milan to reach Europa League semis

articles.description: Marseille are through to the Europa League semi-finals after they beat Benfica 4-2 on penalties at the Stade Velodrome.
articles.title: Marseille beat Benfica in shootout to reach semis

articles.description: Liverpool's hopes of ending Jurgen Klopp's reign with a European trophy are over after they fail to overturn a first-leg deficit against Atalanta.
articles.title: Liverpool's Europa League hopes ended by Atalanta

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan is the "man to beat" as he looks to complete "best season ever" with a record eighth World Championship title in the modern era.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2024: Ronnie O'Sullivan chases record eighth title

articles.description: West Ham are knocked out of the Europa League, losing 3-1 on aggregate after drawing 1-1 with Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen at London Stadium.
articles.title: West Ham exit Europa League with Leverkusen draw

articles.description: Aston Villa reach their first major European semi-final since 1982 with a chaotic penalty shootout victory over Lille in the Europa Conference League.
articles.title: Martinez stars in shootout as Villa reach Euro semis

articles.description: Barcelona midfielder Aitana Bonmati says she is excited to come up against Chelsea again in the Women's Champions League semi-finals.
articles.title: Chelsea can compete for everything - Barca's Bonmati
